title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. Need a width hint for the dialog.

c. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pagesdo the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.
OB: The 'Add' button adds a hidden entry. No selection is possible, but the 'OK' button is enabled.
EB: The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry. The 'OK' button should be disabled when there is no selection.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the 'Add' button.
3. Verify that no hidden entry is added and the 'OK' button is disabled.
